Thatsweet child<lb n="c56-0073__main__26"/>whose smiles delighted & warmed me<lb n="c56-0073__main__27"/>who was so gentleyet so gay,Victor, he <lb n="c56-0073__main__28"/>is Murdered! <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0073__main__29"/>Iwill not attempt to <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0073__main__d5e15471">o</del> console you<lb n="c56-0073__main__30"/>but will simply relate the circumstances <lb n="c56-0073__main__31"/>of the transaction. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0074__main__1"/>Last thurday (May <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0074__main__d5e15491">26</del> 28<shi rend="underline">th</shi>) I; <mod sID="c56-0074__main__d5e15497"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0074__main__d5e15499">your <sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0074__main__d5e15501"/>my <sga-add eID="c56-0074__main__d5e15501"/> </del> <mod eID="c56-0074__main__d5e15497"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0074__main__d5e15507">cousin</del><lb n="c56-0074__main__2"/>my nieceand your two brotherswent to <lb n="c56-0074__main__3"/>walk in Plainpalais. The evening was <lb n="c56-0074__main__4"/>warm and serene, and we prolonged our <lb n="c56-0074__main__5"/>walk <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0074__main__d5e15518">fat</del> farther than usual. It was <lb n="c56-0074__main__6"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0074__main__d5e15524"> <shi rend="underline">ale</shi> </del> already dusk before we thought of <lb n="c56-0074__main__7"/>returning <mod sID="c56-0074__main__d5e15532"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0074__main__d5e15534">When</del><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0074__main__d5e15537"/>and then <sga-add eID="c56-0074__main__d5e15537"/><mod eID="c56-0074__main__d5e15532"/>we <mod sID="c56-0074__main__d5e15541"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0074__main__d5e15543">found</del> <sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0074__main__d5e15546"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0074__main__d5e15546"/><sga-add place="superlinear" sID="c56-0074__main__d5e15552"/>discovered<sga-add eID="c56-0074__main__d5e15552"/><mod eID="c56-0074__main__d5e15541"/>that Ernest<lb n="c56-0074__main__8"/>and Williamwho had gone on before, <lb n="c56-0074__main__9"/>were not to be found. We accordingly <lb n="c56-0074__main__10"/>rested on a seat untillthey should <lb n="c56-0074__main__11"/>return. returned againwith torches<lb n="c56-0074__main__24"/>for I could not restwhen I thought my <lb n="c56-0074__main__25"/>sweet childhad lost himself, and <lb n="c56-0074__main__26"/>was exposed to all the damps & dews <lb n="c56-0074__main__27"/>of night;Elizabeth also suffered extreme <lb n="c56-0074__main__28"/>anguish. <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0074__main__d5e15645">We found the morning I discovered my lovely <lb n="c56-0074__main__30"/>boywhom the night before I had seen <lb n="c56-0075__main__1"/>blooming & active in health stretch <lb n="c56-0075__main__2"/>edon the grass livid and motionless–<lb n="c56-0075__main__3"/>the print of the murderersfinger was <lb n="c56-0075__main__4"/>on his neck. <milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb sID="c56-0075__main__d5e15709"/>anguish <sga-add eID="c56-0075__main__d5e15709"/><mod eID="c56-0075__main__d5e15704"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15713">agony</del> that was <lb n="c56-0075__main__7"/>visible in my countenance revealed<lb n="c56-0075__main__8"/>the secret to Elizabeth. She was <delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c56-0075.02"/><w ana="start"/>extreme<lb n="c56-0075__main__9"/>ly<w ana="end"/><delSpan anchor="c56-0075.02"/><anchor xml:id="c56-0075.03"/><lb n="c56-0075__left_margin__1"/><sga-add sID="c56-0075__left_margin__d5e15738"/>very <sga-add eID="c56-0075__left_margin__d5e15738"/><anchor xml:id="c56-0075.01"/>earnest to see the corpse. <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15743">which</del> <mod sID="c56-0075__main__d5e15746"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0075__main__d5e15748"/>^ <sga-add eID="c56-0075__main__d5e15748"/> <mdel/> <mod eID="c56-0075__main__d5e15746"/><delSpan rend="strikethrough" spanTo="#c56-0075.05"/>for a <lb n="c56-0075__main__10"/>long time <delSpan anchor="c56-0075.05"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15765">refused</del> <anchor xml:id="c56-0075.07"/><lb n="c56-0075__left_margin__1"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" next="#c56-0075.06" sID="c56-0075__left_margin__d5e15774"/>At first I <sga-add eID="c56-0075__left_margin__d5e15774"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" xml:id="c56-0075.06" sID="c56-0075__main__d5e15779"/>attempted to prevent her <sga-add eID="c56-0075__main__d5e15779"/><anchor xml:id="c56-0075.04"/>but <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15784"> <unclear extent="1" unit="chars"/> </del> she persisted, <lb n="c56-0075__main__11"/>and entering the room where it lay <lb n="c56-0075__main__12"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15793">quickly</del>hastily examined the neck of <lb n="c56-0075__main__13"/>the victimand clasping her <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15799">hads</del> <lb n="c56-0075__main__14"/>hands exclaimed— <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15804">Go</del> OhGod! I have <lb n="c56-0075__main__15"/>murdered <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15809">this sweet</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15813">babe</del> <del rend="unmarked" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15816">.</del> my darling <lb n="c56-0075__main__16"/>infant.<milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0075__main__17"/>She faintedand was retoredwith <lb n="c56-0075__main__18"/>extreme difficulty; <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15828">and</del>when she again <lb n="c56-0075__main__19"/>livedit was only to weep and sigh–<lb n="c56-0075__main__20"/>She told methat that same evening <lb n="c56-0075__main__21"/>William had teazedher to let him <lb n="c56-0075__main__22"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15839">we</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15843">we</del> wear a very valuableminiature <lb n="c56-0075__main__23"/>she possessed of your Mother. This <lb n="c56-0075__main__24"/>picture is goneand was doubtless <lb n="c56-0075__main__25"/>the temptation which urged the <w ana="start"/>mur<lb n="c56-0075__main__26"/>derer<w ana="end"/> to the deed. We have no trace <lb n="c56-0075__main__27"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15861">of</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15864">Come my dear Victor</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15867">him</del> at <lb n="c56-0075__main__28"/>present of him, <mod sID="c56-0075__main__d5e15873"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15875">but</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0075__main__d5e15878"/>altho <sga-add eID="c56-0075__main__d5e15878"/><mod eID="c56-0075__main__d5e15873"/>our exertions <mod sID="c56-0075__main__d5e15882"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0075__main__d5e15884">are</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0075__main__d5e15887"/>to discover him <sga-add eID="c56-0075__main__d5e15887"/><mod eID="c56-0075__main__d5e15882"/><lb n="c56-0075__main__29"/>are unremitted; but they will not restore <lb n="c56-0075__main__30"/>my beloved William.<milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0075__main__31"/>Come,dearest Victor,you alone can <lb n="c56-0076__main__1"/>console Elizabeth, <mod sID="c56-0076__main__d5e15909"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0076__main__d5e15911">who</del><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0076__main__d5e15914"/>She <sga-add eID="c56-0076__main__d5e15914"/><mod eID="c56-0076__main__d5e15909"/>weeps <mod sID="c56-0076__main__d5e15918"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0076__main__d5e15920"/> <metamark function="insert">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0076__main__d5e15920"/><sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0076__main__d5e15926"/>continually<sga-add eID="c56-0076__main__d5e15926"/><mod eID="c56-0076__main__d5e15918"/>& accuses herself <lb n="c56-0076__main__2"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0076__main__d5e15932">of all how u</del> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0076__main__d5e15936">so</del> unjustly <mod sID="c56-0076__main__d5e15939"/><sga-add place="sublinear" sID="c56-0076__main__d5e15941"/> <metamark function="displacement" xml:id="c56-0076.01">^</metamark> <sga-add eID="c56-0076__main__d5e15941"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0076__main__d5e15947">and</del> <mod eID="c56-0076__main__d5e15939"/> yet her words <lb n="c56-0076__main__3"/><sga-add corresp="#c56-0076.01" hand="#pbs" place="interlinear" sID="c56-0076__main__d5e15953"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0076__main__d5e15955">of th</del> as the cause of his death—<sga-add eID="c56-0076__main__d5e15953"/><lb n="c56-0076__main__4"/>pierce my heart. We are all unhappy<lb n="c56-0076__main__5"/>but <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0076__main__d5e15964">that</del> will not that be an <w ana="start"/>additio<lb n="c56-0076__main__6"/>nal<w ana="end"/> motive <mod sID="c56-0076__main__d5e15973"/> <mdel>to</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0076__main__d5e15977"/>for<sga-add eID="c56-0076__main__d5e15977"/><mod eID="c56-0076__main__d5e15973"/>you, my <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0076__main__d5e15981">co</del> son, to <mod sID="c56-0076__main__d5e15985"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0076__main__d5e15987">come</del> <sga-add hand="#pbs" place="superlinear" sID="c56-0076__main__d5e15990"/>return <sga-add eID="c56-0076__main__d5e15990"/><mod eID="c56-0076__main__d5e15985"/><lb n="c56-0076__main__7"/>and be our comforter.Your dear Mother! <lb n="c56-0076__main__8"/>Alas, Victor! I now sayThank God she did <lb n="c56-0076__main__9"/>not live to witness <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0076__main__d5e16000">this grief</del> <del rend="unmarked" xml:id="c56-0076__main__d5e16003">–</del> <mod sID="c56-0076__main__d5e16007"/> <mdel>T</mdel> <sga-add place="intralinear" sID="c56-0076__main__d5e16011"/>t <sga-add eID="c56-0076__main__d5e16011"/><mod eID="c56-0076__main__d5e16007"/> he cruel<lb n="c56-0076__main__10"/>miserable death of her youngest darling.<milestone unit="tei:p-END"/> <milestone unit="tei:p-START"/> <lb n="c56-0076__main__11"/>Come,Victor; not brooding <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0076__main__d5e16021">w</del> thoughts <lb n="c56-0076__main__12"/>of vengeance against the assassinbut <lb n="c56-0076__main__13"/>with feelings of peace and gentleness<lb n="c56-0076__main__14"/>that will healinstead of festeringthe <lb n="c56-0076__main__15"/> <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0076__main__d5e16033">woul</del> wound <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0076__main__d5e16036">s</del>of our <del rend="strikethrough" xml:id="c56-0076__main__d5e16039">soul</del> minds.
